content: We've got discussions enabled on the API Guidelines repo now: https://github.com/rust-lang/api-guidelines/discussions
I'm going to go through and convert a bunch of our issues into discussions

I've been working through our open issues. I've been leaving any issues talking about amendments to specific guidelines as issues, converting general questions into Q&A discussions and proposals for new guidelines into open discussions
I've been adding a I-nominated label to amendments that seem like things we might want to accept since rfcbot was ignoring me (probably need to go PR some config somewhere)
